这次的返工就一定要把过程记录下来了。  
1. clone with submodule   
2. cd ./submodule
3. git add .   
   git commit -m   
   git push origin HEAD:main 
4. cd .. # change to the main module  
5. git submodule update --remote submodule # sync the the current change in submodule  
6. git add .   
   git commit -m   
   git push  \\
